ðŸ“– Summary: httpdbg is a Python tool that simplifies debugging HTTP(S) client requests. It provides an interactive console and a web interface to visualize requests, supports various libraries and testing frameworks, and allows customization for specific use cases. This enables developers to easily monitor and analyze network traffic within their Python applications.
